summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以表示项目中的元素或属性的虚拟集合，如全局属性或环境变量属性。A object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象，并使用 方法将内容添加到项目。The following example creates a object and uses the method to add content to the project. 、 和 类用于添加、移除和更改项目中的项。The , , and classes are used to add, remove, and change items in the project. summary.span: 创建 的深层副本或浅表副本。

span.span: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the .
A copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的浅表副本 引用与原始属性组相同的属性组。A shallow copy of a references the same property group as the original. 浅表副本的修改将反映在这两个副本中。Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies. 的深层副本 创建一个要引用的新 XML 元素，以便 可以单独修改的两个副本。A deep copy of a creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the can be independently modified. 如果 与项目中的某个元素直接相对应 (而不是对应于虚拟属性的集合（如环境变量和) 的全局属性），则只允许深层副本。If the corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of virtual properties, such as environment variable and global properties), only deep copies are allowed.
